entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
